title: UNIWAVE LOGISTICS
about_core_values_text: To become the leading logistics company in Southeast Asia, pioneering technology application to connect commerce and create sustainable value for customers.
about_vision_mission_text: Our mission is to provide smart logistics solutions, optimizing transportation and enhancing competitiveness, contributing to global goods connectivity.
feature_competitive_price_desc: Clear costs with no hidden fees, optimizing budgets for businesses.
feature_payment_desc: Seamless transactions between parties with a simple, fast payment process.
feature_tracking_desc: Track shipments anytime, ensuring transparency and control over delivery progress.
feature_partners_desc: Extensive network with major carriers like DHL, FedEx, Maersk, OOCL,...
feature_staff_desc: Experienced, ready to assist, and adaptable to any situation.
feature_international_desc: Diverse transport routes, from domestic to international.
service_lcl_fcl_desc: Flexible shipping, cost-optimized from China to Vietnam.
service_domestic_desc: Nationwide coverage, fast and secure delivery.
service_international_desc: Support for importing and exporting a variety of international goods.
